00031 namespace Hypertable {

00033   typedef boost::shared_array<const char> CharPtr;

00035   class TestData {
00036   public:
00037     bool load(std::string dataDir) {
00038       struct stat statbuf;
00039       char *contentData, *wordData, *urlData;
00040       char *base, *ptr, *last, *str;
00041       off_t len;
00042       std::string shakespeareFile = dataDir + "/shakespeare.txt";
00043       std::string shakespeareFileGz = dataDir + "/shakespeare.txt.gz";
00044       std::string wordsFile = dataDir + "/words";
00045       std::string wordsFileGz = dataDir + "/words.gz";
00046       std::string urlsFile = dataDir + "/urls.txt";
00047       std::string urlsFileGz = dataDir + "/urls.txt.gz";
00048       std::string systemCommand;
00049 
00053       if (stat(shakespeareFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00054         if (stat(shakespeareFileGz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00055           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file 'shakespeare.txt.gz' : %s", strerror(errno));
00056           return false;
00057         }
00058         systemCommand = "zcat " + shakespeareFileGz + " > " + shakespeareFile;
00059         if (system(systemCommand.c_str())) {
00060           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", shakespeareFileGz.c_str());
00061           return false;
00062         }
00063         if (stat(shakespeareFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00064           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", shakespeareFile.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00065           return false;
00066         }
00067       }
00068       if ((contentData = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(shakespeareFile.c_str(), &len)) == 0)
00069         return false;
00070       base = contentData;
00071       while ((ptr = strstr(base, "\n\n")) != 0) {
00072         *ptr++ = 0;
00073         str = new char [ strlen(base) + 1 ];
00074         strcpy(str, base);
00075         content.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00076         base = ptr + 2;
00077       }
00078 
00079       delete [] contentData;
00080 
00084       if (stat(wordsFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00085         if (stat(wordsFileGz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00086           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", wordsFileGz.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00087           return false;
00088         }
00089         systemCommand = "zcat " + wordsFileGz + " > " + wordsFile;
00090         if (system(systemCommand.c_str())) {
00091           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", wordsFileGz.c_str());
00092           return false;
00093         }
00094         if (stat(wordsFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00095           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", wordsFile.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00096           return false;
00097         }
00098       }
00099       if ((wordData = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(wordsFile.c_str(), &len)) == 0)
00100         return false;
00101       base = strtok_r(wordData, "\n\r", &last);
00102       while (base) {
00103         str = new char [ strlen(base) + 1 ];
00104         strcpy(str, base);
00105         words.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00106         base = strtok_r(0, "\n\r", &last);
00107       }
00108       delete [] wordData;
00109 
00110 
00114       if (stat(urlsFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00115         if (stat(urlsFileGz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00116           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file 'urls.txt.gz' : %s", strerror(errno));
00117           return false;
00118         }
00119         systemCommand = "zcat " + urlsFileGz + " > " + urlsFile;
00120         if (system(systemCommand.c_str())) {
00121           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", urlsFileGz.c_str());
00122           return false;
00123         }
00124         if (stat(urlsFile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00125           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", urlsFile.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00126           return false;
00127         }
00128       }
00129       if ((urlData = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(urlsFile.c_str(), &len)) == 0)
00130         return false;
00131       base = strtok_r(urlData, "\n\r", &last);
00132       while (base) {
00133         str = new char [ strlen(base) + 1 ];
00134         strcpy(str, base);
00135         urls.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00136         base = strtok_r(0, "\n\r", &last);
00137       }
00138 
00139       return true;
00140     }
